dcterms:creator: S.G. Armato
G. McLennan
L. Bidaut
dcterms:description: The LIDC-IDRI database is a large reference database containing CT scans with pulmonary nodules, used for research in lung cancer detection.
dcterms:title: Lung Image Database Consortium (LIDC) and Image Database Resource Initiative (IDRI)

dcterms:creator: A. A. A. Setio
A. Traverso
T. Bel
dcterms:description: The LUNA16 Challenge dataset is a collection of CT scans used for evaluating pulmonary nodule detection algorithms, derived from the LIDC-IDRI database.
dcterms:title: LUng Nodule Analysis 2016 (LUNA16) Challenge
